text: 8000 (eight thousand) is the natural number after 7999 and before 8001. ==Roman Numerals== In Roman Numerals, 8000 is V with the line plus MMM. ==Factors of 8000== The factors of 8000 are: 1, 2, 4, 5, 8, 10, 16, 20, 25, 32, 40, 50, 64, 80, 100, 125, 160, 200, 250, 320, 400, 500, 800, 1000, 1600, 2000, 4000 and 8000. ==Multiples of 8000== The first 10 multiples of 8000 are: 8000 x 1 = 8000 8000 x 2 = 16000 8000 x 3 = 24000 8000 x 4 = 32000 8000 x 5 = 40000 8000 x 6 = 48000 8000 x 7 = 56000 8000 x 8 = 64000 8000 x 9 = 72000 8000 x 10 = 80000 ==References== Category:Integers
title: 8000 (number)
